item.title: Introduction to Generative Adversarial Network with Keras
item.description: In 2018 a paint of Edmond de Belamy made by machine learning (GAN) was sold for $432,500 in online auction, Christie's. This made Chritie's the first auction house that sell works created by machine learning. On an unbelievable price. What do you think about this ? Will machine learning help us create arts, or will it kill our creativity? Intro Is artificial intelligence set to become artâ€™s next medium? - Chritie's
